name: Fractured TV Characters Quiz | Fractured TV | 15 Questions

questions.explanation:
Lucy Ricardo.

	Played by the lovely Lucille Ball. 'Lucy, you got some 'splaining to do!'

Bobby Brady.

	The youngest Brady boy.

questions.correct: Agent 99 & Agent Ninety-nine & Agent Ninety Nine
questions.explanation:
Agent 99 & Agent Ninety-nine & Agent Ninety Nine.

	She was Maxwell Smart's sexy partner on "Get Smart." Played by the lovely Barbara Feldon They got married in Season 4.

Colonel Hogan.

	The star of Hogan's Heroes.

Dobie Gillis.

	What a great show! Remember Maynard G. Krebs? (He later morphed into Gilligan.) My dear deceased father-in-law wrote some episodes of this show.

Deputy Barney Fife.

	Deputy Fife on Andy of Mayberry and The Andy Griffith Show. Played by the great Don Knotts.

questions.text: Death Row clam dip OR Death Row beau dean
questions.correct: Jethro Clampett & Jethro Clampitt & Jethro Bodine
questions.explanation:
Jethro Clampett & Jethro Clampitt & Jethro Bodine.

	A player informs me that Jethro's actual last name was Bodine, but I like the clue too much to change it. Hope you sticklers will forgive me.

Corporal LeBeau & Corporal Le Beau.

	Oui, mon colonel! One of Colonel Hogan's fellow prisoners in Stalag 13.

Uncle Fester.

	Their house is a museum, and people come to see 'em. They really are a scree-um, the Addams Family! Da da da da BOMP BOMP, da da da da BOMP BOMP, da da da da, da da da da, da da da da, BOMP BOMP!

Laura Petrie.

	Rob's wife and Ritchie's mom on the Dick Van Dyke Show. Later MTM played Mary Richards on her own show. She was fantastic as the unsympathetic mom of a suicidal teen in 'Ordinary People.'

Oliver Douglas.

	Husband of Lisa Douglas on 'Green Acres.' For a guy who'd realized his life-long dream of living in the country, he was sure grumpy all the time! And Lisa, who was supposed to love the city, seemed to get a kick out of 'farm livin.' Remember how she called him 'Ollie-vah'?

Fred and Ethel Mertz.

	William Frawley and Vivian Vance. What a talented pair!

questions.correct: Mr. Ed & Mister Ed & Mr Ed
questions.explanation:
Mr. Ed & Mister Ed & Mr Ed

	A horse is a horse, of course, of course! 'Wilburrrr!'

Archie Bunker.

	The lovable bigot from 'All in the Family.' My darling late father-in-law wrote an episode for this show, too.
